item.title: Rotating Rubiks Cube
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Rotating Rubiks Cube is an innovative Tetris game. It’s different from the traditional Tetris. You need to drop the given square vertically onto the rotating platform and support the platform to succeed. Successfully building a complete square frame can eliminate the score. Every landing square, the platform will be rotated. Do you want to challenge […]
item.content:encoded:
Rotating Rubiks Cube is an innovative Tetris game. It’s different from the traditional Tetris. You need to drop the given square vertically onto the rotating platform and support the platform to succeed. Successfully building a complete square frame can eliminate the score. Every landing square, the platform will be rotated. Do you want to challenge for high marks?
Use the mouse or your finger to play.

item.title: Light It Up
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Light It Up is an arcade game with both puzzle elements and special operation skills. As a player who is ready to challenge himself should know how to balance collecting stars and complete the current level. All the harder levels are forcing players to make a choise. The game itself has limited difficulty thanks to […]
item.content:encoded:
Light It Up is an arcade game with both puzzle elements and special operation skills. As a player who is ready to challenge himself should know how to balance collecting stars and complete the current level. All the harder levels are forcing players to make a choise. The game itself has limited difficulty thanks to the path you choose.
Use mouse or tap to play.

item.title: Construction Set 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Construction Set 3D is a casual online game. Find the right piece and simply tap to add it to your build. The colorful pieces and lively scenes make this building game a hoot for builders of all ages! In Constructor 3D, you never have to worry about losing a piece or prying bricks apart and […]
item.content:encoded:
Construction Set 3D is a casual online game. Find the right piece and simply tap to add it to your build. The colorful pieces and lively scenes make this building game a hoot for builders of all ages! In Constructor 3D, you never have to worry about losing a piece or prying bricks apart and hurting your fingers, because it’s all virtual!
On PCClick on the screen to play.On MobileClick on the screen to play.
